<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sap Life](/Feats.aspx?ID=273) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 122 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You draw the life force out of your enemies to heal your own wounds. When you cast a [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) spell and damage at least one living creature, you regain Hit Points equal to the spell level of your _harm_ spell. If you aren’t a living creature, you gain no benefit from this feat.
name: Sap Life
